title: Don’t believe this FAKE picture of PM Modi, Prez Trump and Melania Trump; here’s the truth | Newsmobile
author: newsmobile.in
vclaim:
Following the visit of US President Donald Trump to India, a picture has surfaced on the internet in which PM Modi can be seen sitting with President Trump and the US’ First Lady Melania Trump’ in front of a burning house in the background.

ALSO READ: Don’t believe this picture of Swara Bhaskar holding placard on CAA…

NewsMobile fact-checked the viral picture and found it to be FAKE.

On cropping the picture and pitting it though Reverse Image Search, we found the original picture in which Prez Trump, the first lady and PM Modi can be seen sitting together, but NOT in front of a burning house.

The picture is from February 24th, 2020, when US President Donald Trump and the first lady Melania Trump visited Sabarmati Ashram on the first day of their India visit.

On digging further we found the original picture of the burning house and no human is can be seen in the picture.

Putting all together, the above information proves that the viral picture is morphed using a photo editing software.
